name: ObserVR Beta
description:
ObserVR is a viewing application for watching multiple live videos directly from Twitch. Join a room with your friends and watch your favorite streamers, or join a public room and meet new people!Key Features:
  • Watch Your Favorite Content
    With Twitch integration, you can follow up to four of your favorite streamers simultaneously.
  • Customize Your Environment
    Size and place your screens to your liking for the ultimate viewing experience.
  • Chat with Friends
    Voice chat functionality lets you talk to your friends, and head-tracking avatars give you a presence in the virtual world.
  • Interact with Objects from Your Favorite Games
    Weapons and more from major titles are populated into your streaming environment.
